verbs.description: it not [ARGM-TMP: time] to [V: give] up [ARG1: on artie burns in life] sometimes people have to hit bottom before they can become what they were meant to be the same can be said for football players as well which is why it not time to give up on artie burns the third - year cornerback from miami is the most talented one they 've drafted since ike taylor the steelers have had a difficult time drafting and developing cornerbacks over the last 15 years the focus on defense for many of those years was on pittsburgh steelers artie burns steelers
